data.title: CNS Votes to Extend Appointment of Brandon Fried as Chairman of Advisory Board of Directors
data.meta_description: The Cargo Network Services (CNS) Executive Board has voted to extend Brandon Fried’s appointment as Chairman of their Advisory Board of Directors through October 1, 2019.    CNS, the U.S. arm of IATA, represents forwarders, airlines and ground handling companies. The Advisory Board is comprised of C-level executives from the world’s leading airlines and forwarders, many of […]
data.text:
The Cargo Network Services (CNS) Executive Board has voted to extend Brandon Fried’s appointment as Chairman of their Advisory Board of Directors through October 1, 2019.

CNS, the U.S. arm of IATA, represents forwarders, airlines and ground handling companies. The Advisory Board is comprised of C-level executives from the world’s leading airlines and forwarders, many of whom are regular or Platinum members of the AfA.

The vision for CNS is to deliver a safe, secure and sustainable US air cargo industry that drives economic growth, connects and enriches the world.

“In my role as CNS Advisory Board Chairman, I look forward to continuing to represent the interests of the freight forwarding community while supporting and advising CNS in their efforts to serve the entire US air cargo industry,” states Mr. Fried.
